entry.title: Bootstrp ruby on rails
entry.content:
Install Rails 3

Prerequisite: Ruby

{% codeblock %}
$ ruby -v ruby 1.9.3p429 (2013-05-15 revision 40747) [x86_64-darwin12.4.0] {% endcodeblock %}

{% codeblock %}
$ gem install rdoc ## to avoid "file 'lib' not found" error
$ gem install rails --version "=3.2.14" {% endcodeblock %}

As Aug 6th, 2013, the following installed rails 4.0.0, I chose to use Rails 3 for now. Here is how downgrade.

{% codeblock %}
$ gem install rails $ gem uninstall rails Successfully uninstalled rails-4.0.0 $ gem install rails --version "=3.2.14" {% endcodeblock %}
